how-to-use.title: How to use?
how-to-use.content:
To unpack the PHAR archive, you need to click on the area below or drag the * .phar file into it with the mouse. As a result of unpacking, you will receive a ZIP archive.

To package the PHAR archive, you need to click on the area below or drag the * .zip file into it with the mouse. As a result of unpacking, you will receive a PHAR archive.
